name: Memory Quest
description:
The Web version maybe not working on Chrome or Internet Explorer.

The player must remember pairs of cards and is lifting correctly. The number of attempts and the used time affect the final score.

Using colors and shapes will test the player to see how fast is matching all the cards. There are three different difficulties, which will give higher scores depending on how difficult it is.

The cards are selected with the mouse or with a tap if played on a mobile device. When you find a pairs of cards, they will disappear. The games are short so it is perfect for little free time.
